--- title: Core Inventory Export Requests keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Core.rq_inventory_export is a collection of function wrappers around the Discogs api for inventory exports." ---

request_inventory_export[source]

request_inventory_export(user:UserWithUserTokenBasedAuthentication)

Request an export of your inventory as a CSV.

User Authentication needed.

# Example for usage of request_inventory_export
request_inventory_export(user=example_user)

get_recent_exports[source]

get_recent_exports(user:UserWithUserTokenBasedAuthentication, page:Optional[int]=None, per_page:Optional[int]=None)

Get a list of all recent exports of your inventory.

User Authentication needed.

# Example for usage of request_inventory_export
get_recent_exports(user=example_user, page=1, per_page=3)
